title: HOLY FUCK FALLOUT 4 IS COMING OUT IN 5 MONTHS
body:
holy shiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiiit


also holy Kreygasm that fucking gameplay reveal was so amazing holy shit I cannot wait.

I thought there was no possible way this game was going to get a 2015 release date, but holy shit am I glad I was wrong.

11.11.15             [GET HYPED]
